channel.title: New skill (tailoring)
channel.description:
Task:I am new to coding and have done some quite good things by myself without tutorials such as new minigames, now im taking it 1 step father and creating a brand new skill all by myself :D
[center][glow=blue,2,300]T[/glow][glow=green,2,300]A[/glow][glow=blue,2,300]I[/glow][glow=green,2,300]L[/glow][glow=blue,2,300]O[/glow][glow=green,2,300]R[/glow][/center]
Ok to the point... i am going to make this skill really big and shall make all sorts of clothing such as robes and random event items yet as i am going to be busy thinking how to make it all fit together i would like the help of you people :)
I would like for you to think of items and post them for me and i shall add them into the skill (if possible)
this is an example of what i would like to be able to use: [code]Item name(s): desert robe(top), desert robe (bottoms) Requirements: Needle, thread, damp cloth, Instructions: type ::drycloth use the damp cloth on the fireplace infront of you to get a cloth, then type ::weave this shall take you to the room where the loom is, use your cloth on the loom to get a set of robes, use whiteberries on the robes to dye them white and then type ::well and use them on the well to make them resistant to the heat of the desert[/code]
if you can help me then i shall be very grateful and i shall release a tutorial and a list of everyone who helps me shall be on there :)

item.title: New skill (tailoring)
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

actually isnt tailoring same as crafting?
cause tailoring is still sewing with hides and stuff

Read full topic

item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

There is a Tutorial of Mod Taharok that teaches how to make an own skill. Follow that one and you’ll learn how to make a new one.

Read full topic

item.title: New skill (tailoring)
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

Task:I am new to coding and have done some quite good things by myself without tutorials such as new minigames,
now im taking it 1 step father and creating a brand new skill all by myself

[center][glow=blue,2,300]T[/glow][glow=green,2,300]A[/glow][glow=blue,2,300]I[/glow][glow=green,2,300]L[/glow][glow=blue,2,300]O[/glow][glow=green,2,300]R[/glow][/center]

Ok to the point…
i am going to make this skill really big and shall make all sorts of clothing such as robes and random event items yet as i am going to be busy thinking how to make it all fit together i would like the help of you people

I would like for you to think of items and post them for me and i shall add them into the skill (if possible)

this is an example of what i would like to be able to use:

Item name(s): desert robe(top), desert robe (bottoms) Requirements: Needle, thread, damp cloth, Instructions: type ::drycloth use the damp cloth on the fireplace infront of you to get a cloth, then type ::weave this shall take you to the room where the loom is, use your cloth on the loom to get a set of robes, use whiteberries on the robes to dye them white and then type ::well and use them on the well to make them resistant to the heat of the desert

if you can help me then i shall be very grateful and i shall release a tutorial and a list of everyone who helps me shall be on there
